spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jaheira is a 15th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Jaheira has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put Jaheira to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jaheira makes two attacks with her quarterstaff.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit ({@hit 10} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

action.name: Mighty Summons (1/Day)
entries: Jaheira casts the spell conjure animals using a 7th level slot. She can choose to summon three {@filter CR 2 beasts|bestiary|challenge rating=[&2]|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm} or six {@filter CR 1 beasts|bestiary|challenge rating=[&1]|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm}. All summoned beasts have maximum hit points. The damage from the summoned beasts natural weapons are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks and damage.
